title: ‘Moonlight’ actors shine in Calvin Klein underwear campaign
text:
George Pimentel/FilmMagic 
Nothing gets between the men of Moonlight and their rightful Oscar — or their Calvins. 
A day after their film was embroiled in a stunning mix-up that culminated in a win for best picture, Moonlight actors Mahershala Ali, Alex Hibbert, Ashton Sanders, and Trevante Rhodes have been unveiled as the faces of Calvin Klein’s spring 2017 men’s underwear campaign . 
Photographed by Willy Vanderperre, the four actors appear in a series of striking black-and-white images, both moody and joyous. 
“Since the beginning, Calvin Klein’s underwear imagery has always made big statements about masculinity,” Calvin Klein creative director Pieter Mulier said in a statement. “The performances of these actors in Moonlight affected us deeply and made big statements about masculinity in a different way. Somehow we wanted to bring the two together.” 
Rhodes, Sanders, and Hibbert — who each played Moonlight ‘s protagonist, Chiron, at different ages — also wore Calvin Klein to the Oscars, as did costar Naomie Harris.
